data.meta_description:
2,641 likes, 23 comments - thebandwashere on April 16, 2024: "Willie Nelson and Kris Kristofferson at Tootsies Orchid Lounge, Nashville 1982. üì∏ by Alan Messer @alanmesser_pics 

Here‚Äôs what Alan said about this shoot on his gram:

‚ÄúIn 1982 WILLIE and KRIS walked into Tootsie‚Äôs to drink a beer on the last day of the original ownership, after Tootsie‚Äôs death.

I happened to be there taking some pictures of my friend Leeann Atherton and her band. Willie and Kris walked in as I was taking a band picture with my light set up. I asked them to pose for me, Willie bought the bar a round of beers and then borrowed Leann‚Äôs guitar and played, ‚ÄúAngel Flying Too Close to the Ground‚Äù.

Willie published part of this picture in his new songbook, ‚ÄúEnergy Follows Thought‚Äù. 

The bar has continued under new ownership, but the true soul has gone, but not on that winter‚Äôs day.

The charm of Nashville‚Äôs historic downtown has been replaced by mass tourism and urban renewal.‚Äú - Alan Messer

@willienelsonofficial @kristofferson #willienelson #kriskristofferson @tootsies_orchid_lounge #nashville #tennessee".
